name: Radial artery — forearm relationship
text: Radial artery in the forearm lies on the pronator teres muscle and deep to the brachioradialis proximally; it enters the wrist between the brachioradialis and flexor carpi radialis. Clinical relevance: landmark for radial pulse, radial artery harvest, and volar wrist approaches.

name: Ulnar artery — forearm relationship
text: Ulnar artery in the forearm courses proximally between flexor digitorum superficialis and flexor digitorum profundus; distally it lies on the flexor digitorum profundus between flexor carpi ulnaris and flexor digitorum superficialis. Clinical relevance: ulnar-sided forearm and wrist approaches.
